items.title: Who has made Troy's Premier League team of the week?
items.summary: After every round of Premier League matches this season, Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?

items.title: Chelsea confirm Maresca exit amid poor PL run
items.summary: Chelsea confirmed Thursday they have parted ways with manager Enzo Maresca ahead of Sunday's game against Manchester City.

items.title: Pep says Rodri 'changed the game' in City return
items.summary: Pep Guardiola said Rodri showed Manchester City what they have been missing for a year and a half after the Ballon d'Or winner's substitute performance during a goalless draw at Sunderland.

items.title: Liverpool disappointed as unbeaten run goes to 8
items.summary: Arne Slot described Liverpool's 0-0 draw with Leeds United as a "disappointment" despite his team extending their unbeaten run to eight games in all competitions.

items.title: City lose ground to Arsenal with Sunderland draw
items.summary: Sunderland extended their unbeaten Premier League home record to 10 games after holding Manchester City to a goalless draw.

items.title: 'We are not happy' - Man City fall behind Arsenal in title race
items.summary: Pep Guardiola questioned whether the Premier League title race was only a two-horse, but his Manchester City side can ill-afford many slip-ups in their quest to hunt down leaders Arsenal.

items.title: Guardiola ziet ploeg falen in afronding: 'Waren niet eens moeilijke kansen'
items.summary: Pep Guardiola baalde na afloop van het gelijkspel van Manchester City op bezoek bij Sunderland vooral van het grote aantal gemiste kansen. De Spanjaard zag zijn ploeg genoeg cre√´ren, maar falen in de afronding.

items.title: 'No cure' - Searle opens up on eye condition ahead of semi-final with Littler
items.summary: Ryan Searle has opened up on his rare eye conditions as he looks to shock Luke Littler in the semi-finals of the World Darts Championship.

items.title: Villas-Boas vergelijkt Farioli's Porto met de ploeg die in 2011 de treble won
items.summary: Andr√© Villas-Boas is zeer onder de indruk van FC Porto. De voorzitter van de club vergeleek de ploeg van Francesco Farioli zelfs met het Porto dat in het seizoen 2010/11 de treble won.

items.title: 'Heavy metal? It's not even aluminium foil football'
items.summary: As Liverpool are booed off following a goalless draw against Leeds, it was hardly the start to the New Year that Arne Slot's side would have wanted.

items.title: Thomas Frank‚Äôs Spurs booed off after toiling to point on his Brentford return
items.summary: There was an extraordinary moment just before kick-off here when Thomas Frank strode 20 yards on to the pitch and applauded all four corners of the stadium. The Tottenham head coach was applauded back by the Brentford fans because he will always be a hero to them. His work over a near seven-year period as their manager has seen to that. But what of the followers in his new gig, which began when he said farewell to the Gtech last summer? It is safe to say the jury remains out after this driest of January performances had the supporters in the away enclosure adapting a barb they have historically reserved for Arsenal. ‚ÄúBoring, boring Tottenham,‚Äù they chorused in the 85th minute. Continue reading...

items.title: Sunderland halt Man City's winning run with goalless draw
items.summary: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Sunderland‚Äôs match against Manchester City in the Premier League.

items.title: VI Live: drie keer 0-0 op teleurstellende Premier League-avond
items.summary: Namens de redactie van VI nogmaals de beste wensen! Op deze nieuwjaarsdag is er traditioneel voetbal uit de Premier League. Uiteraard volgen we dat in deze VI Live allemaal op de voet.. Veel plezier.

items.title: Stubborn Sunderland deny Manchester City to give Arsenal four-point cushion at top
items.summary: Something had to give and it was not Sunderland‚Äôs unbeaten home Premier League record. Instead ¬≠Manchester City‚Äôs winning streak came to a juddering halt as Pep ¬≠Guardiola‚Äôs side spurned a chance to move within two points of Arsenal at the top of the table. Hats ‚Äì or should that be chapeaux ‚Äì off to R√©gis Le Bris and his clever and courageous Sunderland team for not merely frustrating City but offering Gianluigi Donnarumma scope to remind everyone precisely why he is a world-class goalkeeper. Continue reading...

items.title: Brentford draw with 'boring' Spurs on Frank‚Äôs return
items.summary: Brentford were held to a goalless draw with Tottenham on Thomas Frank‚Äôs return to his former club as Spurs supporters sang "boring, boring Tottenham" at the Gtech Community Stadium.

items.title: New year, same problems for a Liverpool side lacking depth, dynamism
items.summary: Devoid of the swagger that marked last season's title run, Liverpool's draw with Leeds showed how much work remains for Arne Slot.

items.title: Drie Nederlanders van Sunderland houden Man City in toom en helpen Arsenal
items.summary: Het prachtige seizoen van Robin Roefs, Lutsharel Geertruida en Brian Brobbey met Sunderland heeft donderdagavond een volgend hoofdstuk gekregen. Titelkandidaat Manchester City werd op een doelpuntloos gelijkspel gehouden in het Stadium of Light, waardoor de nummer twee van de Premier League in ieder geval voor even koploper Arsenal uit beeld is verloren.

items.title: Eerste 0-0 van Liverpool onder Slot: 'Liverpool is zijn magie kwijt'
items.summary: De Engelse media concludeerden na de remise van Liverpool tegen Leeds United dat het nog altijd niet goed zit bij de ploeg van Arne Slot. Liverpool toonde de afgelopen weken herstel met vier zeges op rij, maar liet in het eerste duel van 2026 weer punten liggen. 'Ze oogden futloos en voorspelbaar.'

items.title: Rosenior leading contender for Chelsea job
items.summary: Strasbourg boss Liam Rosenior is the leading contender to be the next Chelsea manager, but others remain under consideration.

items.title: Glasner‚Äôs Crystal Palace in ‚Äòsurvival mode‚Äô as Fulham leveller extends winless run
items.summary: It is a strange quirk of this fixture that the away side has not lost for the last 10 Premier League meetings between Crystal Palace and Fulham, with the substitute Tom Cairney‚Äôs late equaliser ensuring that streak goes on. Only a brilliant save in added time from Dean Henderson and a glaring miss from the former Palace player Joachim Andersen denied Marco Silva‚Äôs side all the points after falling behind to Jean-Philippe Mateta‚Äôs first goal from open play since 1 November. But Oliver Glasner was still bitterly disappointed that his team could not end a sequence of six games without a victory in all competitions after running out of steam again in their 31st match of the season. ‚ÄúWe are a little bit in survival mode,‚Äù said the Palace manager, whose team now face three games in the space of seven days.
